settings.title: Settings
settings.clearCacheDescription: Are you sure you want to clear the local cache?
settings.clearCacheFailed: Failed to clear cache, please try again later

space.addFailed: Failed to add, please try again
space.localSpaceCreated: Local space created, you can select files on the left to start editing
space.createLocalSpaceFailed: Failed to create local space, please try again
space.unauthorized: Platform {{platform}} is not authorized or authorization has expired, please
space.guideAddSpaceDesc: Click the plus icon on the left to connect GitHub / Gitee and open your repository as a space.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.subtitle: Manage your notes the Git way
introduction.gitIntegrationDesc: Connect directly to GitHub/Gitee repositories and store your notes in your code repository
introduction.markdownEditorDesc: WYSIWYG Markdown editor with support for math formulas and code highlighting
introduction.convenientAccessDesc: Access your notes from anywhere via browser, no local installation required
introduction.secureDesc: Your notes are completely stored in your Git repository, no need to worry about data security

zenNotes.confirmCreateNew: Are you sure you want to create a new note? The current note will be saved.

mindFlow.selectNodeAndApiKey: Please select a node and enter API key
mindFlow.cannotGenerate: Unable to generate new ideas, please try again
mindFlow.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this node? Related connections will also be deleted.

auth.confirmRedirect: Are you sure you want to redirect to {{platform}} login page?

tree.confirmDeleteFile: Are you sure you want to delete this file?
tree.deleteFolderHint: After deleting all files in the folder, the folder will be automatically deleted
tree.renameFolderNotSupported: Renaming folders is not currently supported

story.loadDataFailedDesc: Unable to load saved data, please check your storage settings.
story.generateFailedDesc: Unable to generate AI response, please check your API key and network connection.

community.publishSuccessDesc: Post has been published to the community

thoughts.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this record?

meta.title: GitNote - Git-based Intelligent Note Collaboration Platform
meta.description: GitNote is a Git-based intelligent note platform that supports Markdown editing, version control, and multi-user collaboration. Seamlessly integrates with GitHub/Gitee to make knowledge management easier.
meta.keywords: Git notes,Markdown editor,knowledge management,team collaboration,version control,open source notes,smart writing,document management
